p: Carotenoid content was determined according to previous report (Scolnik et al., 1980). SFE was dissolved in DMSO, and the absorbance was read at 470 nm ( A 470), 647 nm ( A 647), and 663 nm ( A 663). Total carotenoid content was calculated by the equation of (1,000 A 470 + 333.4837 A 663 − 1,343.057 A 647) × 1.136 and shown as mg per g of dried extract.
